component.name: KRename
component.summary: A powerful batch file renamer

xxA powerful batch file renamerxx
强大的批量文件重命名工具

description.p: KRename is a very powerful batch file renamer which can rename a list of files based on a set of expressions. It can copy/move the files to another directory or simply rename the input files. KRename supports many conversion operations.
